```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(datasets.load)
library(clipr)
```

```{r}
Sys.setenv(DISPLAY=":0")
```


get the ones I already have

```{r}
desc0 <- readLines("descriptions.Rmd")
desc0 %>% as_tibble() %>% 
  extract(value, into = c("dataset", "description", "technique"), 
          regex = "^([^ ]*) (.*)\\. (.*)$") -> desc
desc
```


get all datasets

```{r}
d <- datasets()
```

select random rows of d, not including the ones I already got

```{r}
d %>%
  dplyr::filter(str_detect(Package, "cluster")) %>% 
  slice_sample(n = 10) %>% 
unite(ds, Package, Item, sep = "::") %>% 
  anti_join(desc, by = c("ds"="dataset")) -> d2
```

get help

```{r}
d2 %>% 
  slice(1) %>% 
  pull(ds) -> d3
write_clip(d3)
d3 %>% 
  str_c("?", .) -> d4
d4
```

```{r}
eval(parse(text = d4))
```
